return.value: false if error occurred or default value has been used, otherwise true

array.param: name of a private variable (must begin with underscore _, e.g. "_myVar")
default value to return if input element is undefined, of the wrong type or of the wrong size (if array).
Array of direct Data Types - checks if passed value is one of listed Data Types. If not, default value is used instead. Empty array [] means every data type is accepted.

Number or Array - a single size or array of sizes. If passed input value is an array, checks that it has a certain number of elements. If not, default value is used instead. Empty array [] means any size is accepted.

return.value: false if error occurred or default value has been used, otherwise true

syntax.param: A usual array of params is expected. If a non-array argument is passed, it will be converted to 1 element array

array.param: name of a private variable (must begin with underscore _, e.g. "_myVar")
default value to return if input element is undefined, of the wrong type or of the wrong size (if array).
Array of direct Data Types - checks if passed value is one of listed Data Types. If not, default value is used instead. Empty array [] means every data type is accepted.
a single size or array of sizes. If passed input value is an array, checks that it has a certain number of elements. If not, default value is used instead. Empty array [] means any size is accepted.

return.value: false if error occurred or default value has been used, otherwise true

syntax.param: Array of params expected. If a non-array arrgument is passed, it will be converted to 1 element array.
